title: Band, 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in bokhara couching stitch on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Wide border of heavy linen embroidered in two shades of red, blue, green and black. Large, bold pattern of tulips alternating with heavily drawn palmette.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 18th–19th century.
18th–19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in bokhara couching stitch on plain weave. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-4.
